content.title: 100% Funded! & Stretch Goal
content.creator:
Cyanskylight
February 7, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We are thrilled to announce that, thanks to your incredible support, we have achieved our crowdfunding goal
The Chinese New Year holiday has just ended. We will quickly return to work and update you with Vanguard information.
We noticed that some backers are worried about the express delivery from China to the United States. Please don't worry, we have other transportation options. The goods will definitely be delivered to you safely.
It's time to stretch the goal. Thank you for your support againÔºÅ
If you have any questions, please contact hello@cyanskyworld.com
